title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.14 - Eligible uses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.14 - Eligible uses

State Regulations
(a) Program
funds for Federal and urban site development financing projects may be used
for: (1)
new construction, renovation or
leasehold improvements; (2)
the
acquisition or leasing of land, buildings, machinery and equipment; and
(3)
preliminary planning and
the soft costs related to any of the above uses. (b) Program funds for Federal and urban site
development financing may not be used for any ineligible
costs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
